Unser MitgefÃ¼hl gilt allen Menschen in den betroffenen Gebieten, unseren Kolleginnen und Kollegen der #KfW vor Ort sowie allen Mitarbeitenden unserer Projektpartner, die um ihre Familien und Freunde trauern und um die Gesundheit der Verletzten bangen. Die KfW baut ihre UnterstÃ¼tzung fÃ¼r die von der Erdbebenkatastrophe betroffenen Menschen in der #TÃ¼rkei und in #Syrien weiter aus. Sie hat in enger Abstimmung mit der Bundesregierung umgehend schnelle und effiziente #UnterstÃ¼tzung mit allen Partnern und UN-Organisationen angestoÃŸen, um die dringendsten Bedarfe der von den Folgen des Jahrhunderterdbebens betroffenen Menschen zu decken. ğŸ’™ The destruction and suffering following the earthquake disaster in #TÃ¼rkiye and #Syria are appalling. Our condolences go out to all the people in the affected areas, our KfW colleagues on site and all the employees of our project partners who are mourning for their families and friends. KfW is further increasing its #support for the people affected by the earthquake disaster in TÃ¼rkiye and Syria. In close coordination with the German Federal Government, it has immediately initiated rapid and effective support with all partners and UN organisations to meet the most urgent needs of the people affected by the consequences of the region's worst earthquake in a century. ğŸ’™ #TÃ¼rkiye ve #Suriye'de yaÅŸanan deprem felaketinin yol aÃ§tÄ±ÄŸÄ± tahribat ve acÄ± sarsÄ±cÄ± boyutta. I'm really excited to announce the soft launch of SharedSeed! ğŸ˜ƒğŸ˜ğŸš€ SharedSeed is a place where knowledge and experiences are shared freely between professionals. It is a content platform, online community and social network centered around the idea of sharing knowledge and networking freely. The purpose of SharedSeed is to act as a platform to help professionals and employers to grow by sharing knowledge, experiences and practices. SharedSeed will allow professionals to publish their career profile, share their knowledge and experience through questions, answers and articles that are accessable to everyone, all in one place. If you have any suggestions or opinion about SharedSeed, please feel free to contact me. I would love to hear from you! â˜ºï¸
